topic.title: Using a Template in DITA Map PDF WYSIWYG Transformations

body.p:
Once you have created a customization, you can use it from the DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS (WYSIWYG) transformation scenario by using a parameter that references the customization template descriptor file.
Open the transformation scenario dialog box by editing a DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS (WYSIWYG) transformation.
Switch to the Parameters tab.
Click the New button.
Add a parameter with the name pdf.publishing.template and set its value to the full path to the template descriptor file (.opt). You can use the Browse button to select the file.
